comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: "Jeremiah "Joe" Jeannette (also Jennette)(August 26, 1879 - July 2, 1958) is considered one of the best African-American heavyweight boxers of the early 20th century." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Jeanette Tom Kennedy (1885-1965) was the U.S. amateur boxing champion in 1908 who became a professional heavyweight fighter in 1911 and later had a long career in Hollywood as an actor. cyberboxingzone.com/boxing/kennedy.htm www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=7901760 fimography: www.imdb.com/name/nm0448366/
